type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.PreprocessingTool
type.description: A tool that permits configuration of the C preprocessor.

method.name: define
method.description: Defines a named preprocessor macros to use when compiling this binary. The macro will be supplied to the compiler as '-D name'.

method.name: define
method.description: Defines a named preprocessor macro with a value, which will be used when compiling this binary. The macro will be supplied to the compiler as '-D name=definition'.

method.name: getMacros
method.description: The set of preprocessor macros to define when compiling this binary.

property.name: macros
property.description: The set of preprocessor macros to define when compiling this binary.
